description:
Alchu is http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura]`s guardian spirit, the spirit of a http://anidb.net/a230 [Pokemon] that`s super popular with kids. He`s a miraculous monster born from a collaboration between a drunkard and a http://anidb.net/ch69 [Pikachuu] stuffed toy Kagura made as a poor child who wanted to be part of the Pokemon fad.
Alchu swore absolute loyalty to the shochu that gave birth to him, stays with it, and protects it at all times. Since alcohol is his primary source of energy he`s always requesting more sake from his master.
Source: Crunchyroll
name: Alchu
